product_name: Outdoor Research Solar Roller Hat - Women's
long_description: The Outdoor Research Solar Roller(TM) hat has a broad brim to shade your face and eyes from the intense midday sun. Supplex(R) nylon with SolarShield(TM) construction provides ample shade as well as UPF 30 protection from the sun's rays. Nylon headband wicks moisture and feels comfortable next to skin. External drawcord adjustment cinches hat for a perfect fit. Removable chin cord with cordlock secures the hat in high winds. Outdoor Research Solar Roller hat has a foam-stiffened brim that floats in water.
short_description: The Outdoor Research Solar Roller(TM) hat has a broad brim to shade your face and eyes from the intense midday sun.
